ISSUE.TITLE: UPS Plugin is not Tracing the rates response
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: In the UPS plugin, select the **Tracing** checkbox. Go through checkout up until you see the shipping methods/rates. Go to **System Log.** You will see messages, from bottom up. (or do SQL query order by Id) ``` UPS rates. Request: Method: POST, RequestUri: 'https://wwwcie.ups.com/security/v1/oauth/token' ... UPS rates. Response: StatusCode: 200, ReasonPhrase: 'OK', ... Content: {"token_type":"Bearer",... UPS rates. Request: Method: POST, RequestUri: 'https://wwwcie.ups.com/api/rating/v2403/Shop?additionalinfo=', ... Content: {"RateRequest":{"Request":{"RequestOption":"Shop"},... ``` There is no logged message for the response to the rate request.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Possibility to do not select 'ShippingMethod' to filter in 'ShippingByWeightByTotal' plugin (#7164)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7356 UPS Plugin. Added tracing the rates and track responses
